灆字的基本解释

灆
lán
水清。
古同“濫”，腌制的瓜菜。

灆字的汉语字典释义

[①]［lán］
［《廣韻》魯甘切，平談，來。］
(1)水清。
(2)腌制的瓜菜。

灆字的康熙字典解释

【巳集上】【水字部】　灆； 康熙笔画：22； 页码：页662第20
【玉篇】力甘切【集韻】盧甘切，?音藍。水淸也。　又【玉篇】力敢切，音攬。瓜葅也。　又【集韻】呼濫切，音斂。又盧瞰切，音濫。義?同。　或作濫。

灆字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
灆字的起名意思

暂无。

灆
Basic explanation of words
灆
lán
The water is clear.
Ancient Tong "indiscriminate", pickled melons and vegetables.
灆
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［lán］
["Guangyun" Lu Ganqie, talk about it, come. ]
(1) Clear water.
(2) Pickled melons and vegetables.

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Siji 1] [Water Word Department] 　灆; Kangxi Strokes: 22; Page Number: Page 662 20
[Jade articles] Li Ganqie [Jiyun] Lu Ganqie, sound blue. Shuichen also.　[Jade Chapter] I dare to cut, and take the sound. Guaruo also.　 [Ji Yun] Hulanqi, the sound is converging. Lu Kanqi again, the sound is too much. Righteous? Same.　Or mischievous.
